recent_posts.title: Google Patches Chrome’s Fifth Zero-Day of the Year
recent_posts.text: An insufficient validation input flaw, one of 11 patched in an update this week, could allow for arbitrary code execution and is under active attack.

recent_posts.title: Credential stuffing: What it is and how to protect yourself
recent_posts.text: Reusing passwords may feel like a harmless shortcut – until a single breach opens the door to multiple accounts

recent_posts.title: ESET Research: Sandworm behind cyberattack on Poland’s power grid in late 2025
recent_posts.text: The attack involved data-wiping malware that ESET researchers have now analyzed and named DynoWiper
